Description: Sherd of foot with turn of stem of Attic pottery kylix(?); lightly modelled convex edge; broad resting surface; glazed black on top and outside save for reserved band at turn; two scraped grooves on top with added red band between them; stand surface reserved; inside of stem glazed; inscription incised on resting surface.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 514)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1465)
